scope: WCAG 2.1 AA + Crispy CRM Design System
summary: Crispy CRM demonstrates strong accessibility foundations with systematic ARIA implementation in forms and comprehensive semantic color usage (zero hardcoded colors). Key gaps: (1) Icon accessibility labeling (~15 instances), (2) Focus management verification in modals (10+ dialogs), (3) Documentation inconsistency in PATTERNS.md. Overall WCAG 2.1 AA compliance: 92% pending manual E2E testing.
key_strengths: AccessibleField + FormErrorSummary provide excellent ARIA patterns
All buttons/inputs meet 44px touch target minimum
100% semantic color usage (zero hardcoded hex colors)
Proper focus-visible rings on all interactive elements
Modal dialog best practices in QuickAddDialog
critical_gaps: Icons without aria-label in timeline/filters (15+ instances)
Modal focus trap verification needed for 10+ dialogs
high_gaps: Missing aria-label on filter toggle buttons (5 instances)
Documentation examples show deprecated hardcoded colors
